version_description:
New ships and weapons
New daily bosses

* Galaxy map
* Unified progress
* New level types - duel and survival
* Mercenary captains
* Ships and captains earn experience and gain levels

* Exploration of adjacent star systems
* Blueprints and craft
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Santa has come! He runs a small store and a workshop
* New secret flagship on level 200
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Santa has come! He runs a small store and a workshop
* New secret flagship on level 200
* Bug fixes and improvements

Online arena
The Engineer can upgrade and repaint ships
The Smuggler can buy your snowflakes

New ships, weapons, modules, skills, perks
Scavenger's shipyard
New secret flagship
